description:
Computes backscatter from SAR input.

Note that backscatter computation may require instrument specific metadata that is tightly coupled to the original SAR products. As a result, this process may only work in combination with loading data from specific collections, not with general data cubes.

This process uses bilinear interpolation, both for resampling the DEM and the backscatter.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The source data cube containing SAR input.

parameters.name: coefficient
parameters.description:
Select the radiometric correction coefficient. The following options are available:

* `beta0`: radar brightness
* `sigma0-ellipsoid`: ground area computed with ellipsoid earth model
* `sigma0-terrain`: ground area computed with terrain earth model
* `gamma0-ellipsoid`: ground area computed with ellipsoid earth model in sensor line of sight
* `gamma0-terrain`: ground area computed with terrain earth model in sensor line of sight (default)
* `null`: non-normalized backscatter

parameters.name: elevation_model
parameters.description: The digital elevation model to use. Set to `null` (the default) to allow the back-end to choose, which will improve portability, but reduce reproducibility.

parameters.name: mask
parameters.description: If set to `true`, a data mask is added to the bands with the name `mask`. It indicates which values are valid (1), invalid (0) or contain no-data (null).

parameters.name: contributing_area
parameters.description: If set to `true`, a DEM-based local contributing area band named `contributing_area` is added. The values are given in square meters.

parameters.name: local_incidence_angle
parameters.description: If set to `true`, a DEM-based local incidence angle band named `local_incidence_angle` is added. The values are given in degrees.

parameters.name: ellipsoid_incidence_angle
parameters.description: If set to `true`, an ellipsoidal incidence angle band named `ellipsoid_incidence_angle` is added. The values are given in degrees.

parameters.name: noise_removal
parameters.description: If set to `false`, no noise removal is applied. Defaults to `true`, which removes noise.
Proprietary options for the backscatter computations. Specifying proprietary options will reduce portability.
parameters.name: options

returns.description: Backscatter values corresponding to the chosen parametrization. The values are given in linear scale.

DigitalElevationModelInvalid.message: The digital elevation model specified is either not a DEM or can't be used with the data cube given.
